meanings.definition: A person who habitually eats to excess.
meanings.sent1: My friend is an overeater and always has a full plate of food.
meanings.sent2: The overeater at the party finished all the snacks in no time.
meanings.sent3: The overeater joked that they were training for a hot dog eating contest.
meanings.sent4: Her appetite was like that of an overeater at an all-you-can-eat buffet.
meanings.sent5: The image of an overeater surrounded by empty plates stuck in my mind.

meanings.sent1: I tend to overeater when I'm stressed out.
meanings.sent2: She overeater at the buffet and felt uncomfortably full afterwards.
meanings.sent3: He always seems to overeater on pizza night, much to his friends' amusement.
meanings.sent4: The way she overeater sweets was like a child in a candy store.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked cookies always tempts me to overeater.
